referenceName: TODO: PROVIDE A REFERENCE NAME FOR THIS PRODUCT

en-US.name: TODO: REPLACE THIS WITH PRODUCT NAME THAT ALEXA WILL READ DURING OFFER PRESENTMENT AND WILL SHOW UP IN ORDER TITLE
en-US.smallIconUri: TODO: REPLACE THIS WITH URI TO A 108 X 108px PNG IMAGE
en-US.largeIconUri: TODO: REPLACE THIS WITH URI TO A 512 X 512px PNG IMAGE
en-US.summary: TODO: REPLACE THIS WITH TEXT DESCRIBING WHY THIS IS A VALUABLE PRODUCT
en-US.description: TODO: REPLACE THIS WITH A LONGFORM PRODUCT DESCRIPTION FOR DISPLAY
examplePhrases: TODO: REPLACE THIS WITH SAMPLE UTTERANCE FOR HOW USERS WILL BUY OR INVOKE THIS PRODUCT - 'Alexa, buy product name'  Or 'Alexa, play product name'
keywords: TODO: REPLACE THIS WITH ARRAY OF KEYWORDS TO BE USED FOR SEARCH INDEXING THE PRODUCT

customProductPrompts.purchasePromptDescription: TODO: REPLACE THIS WITH TEXT THAT DIFFERS FROM SUMMARY AND ALEXA WILL USE TO DESCRIBE THE PRODUCT IN THE PURCHASE PROMPT
customProductPrompts.boughtCardDescription: TODO: REPLACE THIS WITH TEXT TO DISPLAY IN APP CARD WHEN CUSTOMER HAS PURCHASED THIS PRODUCT

amazon.com.releaseDate: TODO: REPLACE THIS WITH DATETIME AFTER WHICH YOU WISH THE PRODUCT TO BE PURCHASABLE. FORMAT: "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm'Z'" OR "yyyy-MM-dd"

en-US.privacyPolicyUrl: TODO: REPLACE THIS WITH URL TO YOUR OWN PRIVACY POLICY
